statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_type, cost_amount, expense_date FROM construction_costs_expenses;
SELECT * FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, cost_amount FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, cost_amount FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE cost_type LIKE '%labor%';
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM construction_costs_expenses GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE project_id = 100 ORDER BY cost_amount DESC, expense_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, cost_amount FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE cost_type = 'Labor' ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_costs FROM construction_costs_expenses GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT project_name, cost_type, cost_amount FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT project_id) AS unique_projects, AVG(cost_amount) AS avg_cost FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE cost_type = 'Materials';
SELECT * FROM construction_costs;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM construction_costs WHERE cost_category = 'Labor';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE project_name = 'Project X' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT cost_id, project_name, cost_amount FROM construction_costs WHERE cost_category IN ('Material', 'Equipment') ORDER BY cost_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM construction_costs WHERE cost_amount > 5000 AND cost_category = 'Labor';
SELECT * FROM construction_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000 ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount FROM construction_costs WHERE cost_category='Material' AND cost_amount < 5000;
SELECT project_name, cost_amount, expense_amount FROM construction_costs JOIN expenses ON construction_costs.project_name = expenses.project_name;
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM construction_costs GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(expense_id) AS num_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_name HAVING num_expenses > 5;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, project_name FROM employees INNER JOIN construction_projects ON employees.project_id = construction_projects.project_id;
SELECT expense_id, amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Material';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.project_name FROM employees e JOIN construction_projects p ON e.project_id = p.project_id
SELECT * FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM construction_projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, SUM(salary) AS total_salary FROM employees e GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Material' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM construction_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM construction_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT labor_name, labor_rate FROM labor_costs ORDER BY labor_rate DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM materials WHERE material_category = 'Metal' ORDER BY material_price ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_category, material_price FROM materials WHERE material_price > 1000 ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT labor_name, labor_category, labor_rate FROM labor_costs WHERE labor_rate BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM construction_projects JOIN expenses ON construction_projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, expense_category, expense_amount FROM construction_projects JOIN expenses ON construction_projects.project_id = expenses.project_id WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM project ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, cost FROM cost_category JOIN cost_item ON cost_category.category_id = cost_item.category_id WHERE cost > 1000;

SELECT project_name, expense_description, amount FROM project JOIN project_expense ON project.project_id = project_expense.project_id JOIN expense ON project_expense.expense_id = expense.expense_id WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM project;
SELECT * FROM expense WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT project_name, expense_date, expense_description, amount FROM project p JOIN project_expense pe ON p.project_id = pe.project_id JOIN expense e ON pe.expense_id = e.expense_id WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT pc.category_name, ci.item_name, ci.cost FROM cost_category pc JOIN cost_item ci ON pc.category_id = ci.category_id WHERE cost > 500;

SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(pe.expense_id) AS total_expenses, SUM(e.amount) AS total_cost FROM project p JOIN project_expense pe ON p.project_id = pe.project_id JOIN expense e ON pe.expense_id = e.expense_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_cost > 5000;
